actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of May 27 through June 2, 1973, as "National Stamp Collecting Week", and to proclaim June 1, 1973, as "National Stamp Collectors' Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the week of May 27 through June 2, 1973, as "National Stamp Collecting Week", and to proclaim June 1, 1973, as "National Stamp Collector's Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of May 27 through June 2, 1973, as "National Stamp Collecting Week", and to proclaim June 1, 1973, as "National Stamp Collectors' Day".
